resources.string:
Android leads the market of mobile operating systems, with over 75% of the global market share. 

The Android Developer with Kotlin Nanodegree program will teach you how to develop cutting-edge apps on the world's most popular mobile platform. Kotlin has become the fastest-growing programming language, according to GitHub, and is used by over 60% of professional Android developers due to its ability to increase productivity, developer happiness, and code safety. Companies like Google, Square, Pinterest, CapitalOne, and Atlassian are already using Kotlin in their apps. Android app development has become increasingly Kotlin-first, so this is an opportune time to learn Kotlin. 
If you are a programmer who is interested in mastering the Android platform and building top-rated Android apps in Kotlin, this is the program for you. If you are not ready for this intermediate-level program, or if you are new to programming, please check out our Android Basics Nanodegree program.
